title: People Are Putting 'Rare' Plastic McDonald's Straws On ... - Reddit
body: People Are Putting 'Rare' Plastic McDonald's Straws On eBay For Thousands Of Dollars — as their iconic white, yellow and red plastic straws are going the way of the dinosaur as the company continues to make the change to paper straws at locations all over the world. ... They got rid of their long skinny plastic spoons for stirring ...
readable_content:
- viperone (2023-12-08): Still haven't encountered a paper straw I like. They always, always, always get soggy, and often have a taste to them. I guess it's good encouragement for me not to get a drink and keep the pounds off though...
- vitev009 (2023-12-08): Guess I should grab a handful at work?
- Deminedprincess (2023-12-08): You can list anything on eBay for thousands of dollars, it doesn’t mean anyone is going to buy it!
    - PaulyPlayer24 (2023-12-08): They got rid of their long skinny plastic spoons for stirring coffee in late 1970s because people found them perfect for snorting Cocaine. They can be found on eBay. 1979 was the last year they were Made. The spoon was replaced with a paddle coffee stirrer.
        - PaulyPlayer24 (2023-12-08): Those spoons held exactly 100 mg. Dealers loved them. I’ll sell you 2 McSpoons. 200 mgs.
    - taylordmn (2023-12-08): they still have these in canada..
    - TheDodsons (2023-12-08): Keep everything from mcdonalds.. ive learned everythings collectible after a while.. id buy an arch deluxe in epoxy to place on display.. anyone?
    - creampuffchoco (2023-12-08): We still have the plastic ones
